biotools.summary: It is a new functional genomic databases serving the amoebozoa research communities. It contains the genomes of three Entamoeba species (E. dispar, E. invadens and E. histolityca) and microarray expression data for E. histolytica. Importantly it utilizes the graphical strategy builder that affords a database user the ability to ask complex multi-data-type questions with relative ease and versatility.

bioschemas.name: AmoebaDB
